thread.title: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Raman Mistakenly Hurts Shagun, Who Is Pregnant!
thread.title_full: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Raman Mistakenly Hurts Shagun, Who Is Pregnant!

title: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Raman Mistakenly Hurts Shagun, Who Is Pregnant!
text:
Â» Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Raman Mistakenly Hurts Shagun, Who Is Pregnant! Yeh Hai Mohabbatein Spoiler: Raman Mistakenly Hurts Shagun, Who Is Pregnant! In Yeh Hai Mohabbatein, Raman tries to apologise to Ishita. Unluckily, every time his plan fails. This time too, Raman mistakenly hurts Shagun, who is pregnant! Published: Friday, February 3, 2017, 21:23 [IST] Subscribe to Filmibeat 
The makers of Yeh Hai Mohabbatein are leaving no stones unturned to bring the show back to the top slot. Ruhi and Sohail's track failed badly and now makers are trying something new. It was earlier said that Raman (Karan Patel) and Ishita ( Divyanka Tripathi ) would part ways and a leap will be seen in the show.Thankfully, the leap didn't happen, but Ishita decides to leave the Bhalla house to teach Raman, a lesson. Along with Ishita, Mr Bhalla too, leaves the house, as he too, feels Raman overreacts to all situations and should be taught a lesson! Read on to know the spoilers with pictures.... Raman Drunk 
In the upcoming episodes, Raman gets drunk. He creates a scene in Iyer's house. He forces Ishita to return home, while Ishita asks him to calm down! Mr Bhalla Warns Raman 
Mr Bhalla watches Raman forcing Ishita and slaps him. He scolds Raman for getting drunk and forcing Ishita to return home. Ishita Irritated 
Ishita is irritated with Raman's behaviour and she goes to Mani's place to stay. Raman gets to know about the same. He goes to Mani's house to convince Ishita. Raman Hurts Shagun 
Since Ishita was not ready to listen to Raman, he decides to apologise to her by hook or crook. Raman mistakenly enters Shagun's room. He thinks Shagun as Ishita and puts blanket over her. Shagun Hurt 
Shagun suffocates and is hurt. The doctor will be called who scolds Mani for being careless. It is then Raman reveals that it was his mistake and not Mani's. Shagun Pregnant 
The doctor surprises everyone by announcing that Shagun is pregnant. Mani, Ishita and Raman are happy with Shagun's pregnancy news. Aliya and Ruhi distribute sweets. Ishita & Shagun 
Shagun scolds Raman for his behaviour. He apologises and asks Shagun to take rest, while Ishita again taunts Raman. She even tells Shagun that Raman will never change! Story So Far... Ishita stays in the Iyer house and Mr Iyer helps Mr Bhalla to adjust in the house. Meanwhile Raman tries a lot to convince Ishita to bring her back home, but remains unsuccessful.In the latest episode, we saw how Raman fakes toothache so that Ishita attends him. But instead, she sends tablet for Raman. This irks Raman, while Romi tries to tell him that his anger will not find solution for this.Meanwhile, Raman gets the police Abhishek's call who tells him that his finacee Divya wants to meet Ishita and Raman. Raman manages to get Ishita to the restaurant and convinces her to not to reveal about their fight.But, when Divya tags them as an ideal couple Ishita gets hurt and reveals that they are not ideal couple and they had a fight. They are not together now. In the upcoming episodes, Raman tries hard to impress Ishita and get her back home. Will Ishita forgive Raman and return to the Bhalla house? Stay locked to this space for the latest updates... Other articles published on Feb 3, 2017 Please Wait while comments are loading...
